document_data.name: Harpoon
document_data.mainbody: '''Harpoons''' were [[spear]]-like weapons used to hunt marine animals.
document_data.Description: The metal head of a harpoon was fixed to a wooden shaft. The head was often pointed and hooked to increase the weapon's grip in flesh and cause more harm. The harpoon was connected to a rope which the thrower could release or increase tension on to reel a target in or throw it off balance. A typical harpoon weighed {{SI|6|lb|k|long=yes}} and could be purchased for 20 [[gp]].

Notable Users.Religions:
* In the [[Church of Umberlee]], harpoons were favored as weapons by the [[specialty priest]]s known as [[Anchor (specialty priest)|anchors]].<ref name="WaPotR-p120" > and [[waveservant]]s.<ref>
* [[Shaman]]s often favored the use of harpoons.<ref>
* [[Waterwalker]]s, a variety of specialty priest in the [[Church of Istishia]], favored the use of harpoons as weapons.<ref>
